definitions.text: make or work out a plan for; devise
examples: They contrived to murder their boss

definitions.text: come up with (an idea, plan, explanation, theory, or principle) after a mental effort
examples: excogitate a way to measure the speed of light
She threw the flashlight beam into the corner
The setting sun threw long shadows

definitions.text: showing effects of planning or manipulation
examples: a novel with a contrived ending
that artificial humility that her husband hated
when people try to correct their speech they develop a stilted pronunciation
